overview: "The firing squad of Penina", a book written in the 1970s, was destroyed during the last Argentine military dictatorship.  Aldo Oliva, its author, never saw it printed.  More than 25 years passed until someone found a copy, and Antonio, his son, began the path of re-edition, his steps behind those of his father, the reconstruction of the murder of the Catalan anarchist and the permanent glimpse of what was not known. can kill: our memory.  The documentary accompanies Antonio's searches on two continents, touring Argentina and Spain.
title: Hombres de ideas avanzadas
